notes: This registry is intentionally shallow; tokens identify families, not complete semantics
Consumers may ignore any token; unknown tokens should be treated as non-fatal and may trigger warnings
Producers should prefer registry tokens when applicable; for niche or product-specific needs, consider a prefixed token via extensions rather than expanding this registry rapidly

chart.description: chart family tokens used with representation.type = `chart`

area.label: area
area.description: encodes values using a filled region, typically bounded by a line and an axis or baseline

boxplot.label: boxplot
boxplot.description: represents distributions using quartiles, median, and whiskers

donut.label: donut
donut.description: pie-like chart with a central hole

funnel.label: funnel
funnel.description: encodes stage-based quantities decreasing through a process

heatmap.label: heatmap
heatmap.description: encodes values using a color scale across a two-dimensional grid of categories or bins

histogram.label: histogram
histogram.description: represents a distribution by binning a variable and encoding bin counts or densities

line.label: line
line.description: encodes values using line segments connecting ordered points

pie.label: pie
pie.description: encodes part-to-whole proportions as angular segments of a circle

point.label: point
point.description: encodes values using discrete marks such as points or symbols

radar.label: radar
radar.description: encodes values along multiple radial axes

sankey.label: sankey
sankey.description: encodes flows between entities using directed bands whose widths represent magnitude

scatter.label: scatter
scatter.description: encodes relationships using point marks positioned by two quantitative or ordered dimensions

treemap.label: treemap
treemap.description: encodes hierarchical quantitative data using nested rectangles sized by value

waterfall.label: waterfall
waterfall.description: encodes additive or subtractive contributions to a running total

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined chart subtypes apply

diagram.description: diagram family tokens used with representation.type = `diagram`

anatomical-diagram.label: anatomical diagram
anatomical-diagram.description: represents the structure of a biological organism or system

block-diagram.label: block diagram
block-diagram.description: represents a system as discrete functional blocks and their relationships

circuit-diagram.label: circuit diagram
circuit-diagram.description: schematic representation of electrical or electronic components and their connections

concept-map.label: concept map
concept-map.description: represents concepts and their relationships, often with labeled connections

flowchart.label: flowchart
flowchart.description: represents a process or workflow using nodes and directed connections

geometric-diagram.label: geometric diagram
geometric-diagram.description: represents geometric figures, relationships, or constructions

map-diagram.label: map diagram
map-diagram.description: non-geographic diagram that uses spatial layout metaphorically

network-diagram.label: network diagram
network-diagram.description: represents entities and their connections in a non-hierarchical graph

schematic.label: schematic
schematic.description: simplified symbolic representation of a system or mechanism

sequence-diagram.label: sequence diagram
sequence-diagram.description: shows interactions over time between participants or components

state-diagram.label: state diagram
state-diagram.description: represents states and transitions between states

timeline-diagram.label: timeline diagram
timeline-diagram.description: represents events or phases along a temporal axis

venn-diagram.label: venn diagram
venn-diagram.description: represents set relationships using overlapping regions

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined diagram subtypes apply

map.description: map family tokens used with representation.type = `map`

choropleth.label: choropleth
choropleth.description: encodes values by shading or coloring geographic regions

proportional-symbol.label: proportional symbol
proportional-symbol.description: encodes values with symbol size at geographic locations

dot-density.label: dot density
dot-density.description: encodes quantity by placing dots within geographic regions

flow-map.label: flow map
flow-map.description: shows movement or flow between locations using lines or arrows

cartogram.label: cartogram
cartogram.description: distorts geography to reflect a data variable

topographic-map.label: topographic map
topographic-map.description: represents terrain and elevation, often with contour lines

route-map.label: route map
route-map.description: emphasizes paths, routes, or networks over geography

thematic-map.label: thematic map
thematic-map.description: represents one or more themes or variables over geography

symbol-map.label: symbol map
symbol-map.description: uses symbols at locations to represent categories or attributes

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined map subtypes apply

table.description: table family tokens used with representation.type = `table`

data-table.label: data table
data-table.description: a general-purpose table of records with headers and cells

pivot-table.label: pivot table
pivot-table.description: a table that summarizes data by pivoting dimensions into rows and columns

cross-tab.label: cross tab
cross-tab.description: a contingency table that aggregates measures by two or more dimensions

frequency-table.label: frequency table
frequency-table.description: a table that reports counts or frequencies for categories or bins

truth-table.label: truth table
truth-table.description: a table that lists boolean inputs and outputs for a logical expression

matrix.label: matrix
matrix.description: a table interpreted as a mathematical or structural matrix

schedule-table.label: schedule table
schedule-table.description: a table organizing events, times, or stages in a grid format

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined table subtypes apply

formula.description: formula family tokens used with representation.type = `formula`

equation.label: equation
equation.description: a single mathematical or symbolic equality

equation-system.label: equation system
equation-system.description: a set of equations intended to be considered together

inequality.label: inequality
inequality.description: a mathematical or symbolic inequality statement

function-definition.label: function definition
function-definition.description: a definition of a function, mapping, or relation

expression.label: expression
expression.description: a mathematical or symbolic expression without an explicit equality

derivation.label: derivation
derivation.description: a sequence of expressions or equations showing steps toward a result

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined formula subtypes apply

illustration.description: illustration family tokens used with representation.type = `illustration`

drawing.label: drawing
drawing.description: a hand-drawn or digitally drawn illustration

icon.label: icon
icon.description: a small symbolic graphic intended to represent an object or action

technical-illustration.label: technical illustration
technical-illustration.description: an illustrative rendering intended to explain a technical object or concept

infographic.label: infographic
infographic.description: an explanatory graphic that may combine text, icons, and simple visual encodings

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined illustration subtypes apply

other.label: other
other.description: fallback value used when none of the defined type-specific subtype registries apply
